entry.title: Surface air temperature potholes in CMIP6 historical simulations

link.title: Surface air temperature potholes in CMIP6 historical simulations

entry.content:
Studying climate has a lot to do with modelling and that is a complex problem.

Recently, a research done by Zhang et al (2020) shows that despite models being more complex and include online chemistry. They underpredicts the surface air temperature.

Full paper here
entry.summary: Models have become more sophisticated, yet they are not performing as we expected.
